FRD-ACV.definition: A vulnerability not fully remediated within accepted timelines.

FRD-ANA.definition: All entities that participate in the FedRAMP assessment.

IAM.name: Identity and Access Management
IAM.theme: A secure cloud service offering controls access and user identity.

KSI-IAM-AAM.name: Automating Account Management
KSI-IAM-AAM.statement: Securely manage account lifecycle and access using automation.

KSI-IAM-APM.name: Adopting Passwordless Methods
KSI-IAM-APM.statement: Use secure passwordless methods where feasible.

CNA.name: Cloud Native Architecture
CNA.theme: A secure cloud service offering uses cloud-native security guardrails.

KSI-CNA-CIC.name: Container Image Controls
KSI-CNA-CIC.statement: Continuously scan and harden container images.

MAS-CSO-IIR.name: Identify Information Resources
MAS-CSO-IIR.statement: Providers MUST identify information resources in scope for authorization.

MAS-CSO-MDI.name: Metadata Inclusion
MAS-CSO-MDI.statement: Providers MUST include metadata in scope decisions where applicable.

SCG-CFG-BAS.name: Baseline Configurations
SCG-CFG-BAS.statement: Providers MUST maintain baseline secure configurations.

SCN-SCR-MAJ.name: Major Significant Change
SCN-SCR-MAJ.statement: Providers MUST submit a significant change notification before major architecture changes.
